##
# Library Example component configuration.
# Creates and installs a library

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.16)

# The name of the library
project(libEx)

# Creates a library 
add_library(${PROJECT_NAME} src/Example.cpp)

# Add include directories to the project
target_include_directories(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC
    ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/inc
)

# Add directory containing the coverage files generated by gcov
set(coverage_files_dir 
    ${coverage_files_dir} 
    ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/CMakeFiles/${PROJECT_NAME}.dir/src
    PARENT_SCOPE)

# Add Tests
add_subdirectory(test)

# Install rules
# NOTE: This is a static library hence no need of installing it. Let's install it anyhow as an example.
install(TARGETS ${PROJ_NAME} DESTINATION lib)
install(FILES inc/Example.hpp DESTINATION include)
